rukus.text: 79|1|shapath hai un farishton kee jo doobakar (praan) nikaalate hain
79|2|aur jo saralata se (praan) nikaalate hain.
79|3|aur jo tairate rahate hain.
79|4|phir jo aage nikal jaate hain.
79|5|phir jo kaary kee vyavastha karate hain.
79|6|jis din dharatee kaanpegee.
79|7|jisake peechhe hee doosaree kamp aa jaayegee.
79|8|us din bahut-se dil dhadak rahe honge.
79|9|unakee aankhen jhukee hongee.
79|10|ve kahate hain ki kya ham phir pahalee sthiti mein laaye jaayenge
79|11|jab ham (bhurabhuree) (khokhalee) asthiyaan (haddiyaan) ho jaayenge.
79|12|unhonne kahaah tab to is vaapasee mein kshati hai.
79|13|bas vah ek jhidakee hogee.
79|14|tab ve akasmaat dharatee ke oopar honge.
79|15|(he nabee!) kya tumhen moosa ka samaachaar pahuncha
79|16|jab pavitr vaadee tuva mein use usake paalanahaar ne pukaara.
79|17|firaun ke paas jao, vah vidrohee ho gaya hai.
79|18|tatha usase kaho ki kya tum pavitr hona chaahoge
79|19|aur main tumhen tumhaare paalanahaar kee seedhee raah dikhaoon, to tum daroge
79|20|phir use sabase bada chinh (chamatkaar) dikhaaya.
79|21|to usane use jhuthala diya aur baat na maanee.
79|22|phir prayaas karane laga.
79|23|phir logon ko ekatr kiya, phir pukaara.
79|24|aur kahaah main tumhaara param paalanahaar hoon.
79|25|to allaah ne use sansaar tatha paralok kee yaatana mein gher liya.
79|26|vaastav mein, isamen usake lie shiksha hai, jo darata hai.
